import React from 'react' import logo from '../Image/logo.png' import userIcon from '../Image/User.png' import logoutIcon from '../Image/logout.png' // Assuming you have a logout icon image, otherwise will use text import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { useAuth } from '../contexts/AuthContext' import '../Styles/header.css' function Header() { const { user, logout } = useAuth() const getCalculatorLink = () => { if (!user) return '/calculator' if (user.is_staff) return '/admin-tariffs' if (user.is_worker) return '/worker' return '/calculator' } const getCalculatorText = () => { if (!user) return 'Калькулятор' if (user.is_worker) return 'Инструменты' return 'Калькулятор' } const getDashboardLink = () => { if (!user) return '/login' if (user.is_staff) return '/admin-tariffs' // Исправлено: для работника личный кабинет ведет на /dashboard if (user.is_worker) return '/dashboard' return '/dashboard' } return (

Nova

{user && ( )}
) } export default Header
